item.title: What Happens When You Put a URL in Your Browser?
item.description: What Happens When You Put a URL in Your Browser? # Understanding what happens when you type a URL into your browser and hit enter is essential for grasping the basics of web technology. Hereâ€™s a detailed step-by-step breakdown of the process. 1. URL Entry and Parsing # Input and Validation: When you enter a URL in the address bar, the browser first validates the URL to ensure it’s properly formatted.
